description: '''Rachael Amanda Yamagata''' (born September 23, 1977) is an American singer-songwriter and pianist from [[Arlington, Virginia|Arlington]], [[Virginia]]. She began her musical career with the band Bumpus before becoming a solo artist and releasing five EPs and four studio albums. Her songs have appeared on numerous television shows and she has collaborated with [[Jason Mraz]], [[Rhett Miller]], [[Bright Eyes (band)|Bright Eyes]], [[Ryan Adams]], [[Toots and the Maytals]], [[Ray Lamontagne]] and [[Matt Nathanson]].
